articles.title: Australian move to fast-track new gun and protest laws draws criticism - BBC
articles.description: Civil liberties advocates say laws 'damage our democracy' while others say they scapegoat gun owners.
articles.content:
Civil rights groups and pro-gun advocates in Australia have raised concerns that new fast-tracked laws will place undue restrictions on firearms and protests in the wake of the Bondi shootings.
On M… [+5099 chars]
